entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
